name: Super Boost Monkey
description:
Boost Monkey is on the loose! There’s chaos in the lab!

Jump into your Pedal-Copter in this endless escapade as you boost your banana count and reach lightning fast speeds.

Complete fun and challenging missions in a lab filled with danger at every turn.

Are you skilled enough to reach Super Boost Speed and survive it?

* One touch gameplay. TAP to jump.
* Grow huge and smash through walls, or shrink down to half your size and go unnoticed with these power ups and more.
* Smash through to secret labs where you can swing from vine to vine or where the laws of gravity are broken.
* Dash, dive, and spin to avoid all the obstacles in your way.
* Scare the timid scientists. They may even give you a banana or two!
* Rise to the top of the leaderboards.
* Fast-paced action filled musical score.

Become a fan of Super Boost Monkey on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/superboostmonkey

Follow Super Boost Monkey on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/sboostmonkey
